mapper.select: SELECT o.ord_num, o.total_price, o.total_dlv_price, o.total_disc_price, o.total_pay_price, o.ord_date, d.waybill_num, d.dlv_corp, d.state AS dlv_state, d.rcpr, d.rcpr_mobile, d.main_addr, d.detail_addr, d.msg, p.pay_num, p.state AS pay_state, p.card_appv_num, p.card_cncl_num, p.mtd_code FROM neo.ord o JOIN neo.dlv d ON o.ord_num = d.ord_num JOIN neo.pay p ON o.ord_num = p.ord_num WHERE o.ord_num = #{ord_num}

-- SELECT od.ord_num, od.ord_date, od.item_name, od.opt1, od.opt2, od.item_qty, od.item_price, od.ord_state SELECT o.ord_num, o.ord_date, o.ord_state, od.item_num, od.main_img, od.item_name, od.opt1, od.opt2, od.opt3, od.item_qty, od.item_price FROM neo.ord_detail od JOIN neo.ord o ON o.ord_num = od.ord_num WHERE o.ord_num = #{ord_num}
